author: rederpj
msg: Updates to the mod_mem_cache.xml file to update formatting, improve
detail and accuracy, and to align with what the code does.

author: rederpj
msg: Since the directives CacheIgnoreCacheControl and CacheIgnoreNoLastMod
are AP_INIT_FLAG one should be able to set them explicitely to "Off".

author: gbenson
msg: Content-length headers don't seem to get added to POST requests with
empty bodies, causing httpd to return a 411 Length Required.
